Fine-knit gloves with matching fingerless gloves. The fingerless gloves have a print motif on the uppers. The gloves can be worn over each other or separately.
Henley shirt in slub jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.
Henley shirt in slub jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, jersey-lined drawstring hood, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slightly shorter top in soft pointelle made from a viscose blend with short, rib-trimmed sleeves and a ribbed hem.
Slightly shorter top in soft pointelle made from a viscose blend with short, rib-trimmed sleeves and a ribbed hem.
H&M SUPPORTS WWF Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Metal earrings with a pendant in the shape of a Christmas bauble. Length 4.5 cm.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thin metal chain necklace with interchangeable pendants in different designs. Adjustable length, 40-46 cm.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and hem. Opening with ties at the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with elastication and a small frill trim at the top and hem. Opening with ties at the front and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Strappy top in satin with lace details, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Metal rings in various designs.

Calf-length, sleeveless dress in lace with an opening and button at the back of the neck and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with pleats at the top. Partly lined in a contrasting colour.
Metal studs in the shape of gift bows.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Five pairs of studs and one pair with a chain and pendant.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with an adjustable shoulder strap, flap with a snap lock and one inner compartment. Unlined. Size approx. 11x20x27 cm.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.

Short dress in a patterned weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip in one side, and a gently flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined skirt.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs with plastic details. Length 2 cm, 2.5 cm and 6.5 cm.
Metal chain necklace with large pendants in various designs. Adjustable length, 51-58 cm.
Sleeveless romper suits in soft organic cotton jersey with short legs and press-studs at the top and crotch.
Slightly wider-fitting jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Dropped shoulders with raw-edge seams, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slightly wider-fitting jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere. Dropped shoulders with raw-edge seams, long, wide sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, short, flounced sleeves and a knot detail at the hem. Slight shorter front and elastication at the back of the hem.
Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high waist, box pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Knee-length skirt in airy chiffon with a high waist, box pleats at the top, a detachable tie belt, concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Lined.
Small, sturdy velour bag with a quilted front, flap with a magnetic closure and shoulder strap with a faux fur pompom. One zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 6x14x20 cm.
Short imitation leather skirt with a high waist with a frill trim and adjustable drawstring. Lined.

Long-sleeved jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke at the back. Pleats and a detachable tie belt at the waist, large side pockets, welt back pockets and straight, wide legs with visible seams at the knees.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Length from 4.5 cm to 8 cm.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Length from 4.5 cm to 8 cm.
Metal hoop earrings with a round, embossed pendant. Diameter approx. 4 cm.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and braces with an adjustable fastening at the front.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and braces with an adjustable fastening at the front.
Trenchcoat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and a loose yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, and a single back vent. Lined.
Trenchcoat in woven fabric with notch lapels, a hook-and-eye fastening at the top and a loose yoke at the back. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets, and a single back vent. Lined.
Coat in felted fabric containing some wool with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Caps in cotton twill with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Hipster briefs in microfibre and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with embroidery. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with embroidery. V-neck, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Imitation leather trainers with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Single-breasted jacket in stretch fabric made from a wool blend woven in a special way to make it more crease-resistant. Narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a lace yoke.
